activities: McGraw-Hill Education is a global leader in providing print and digital education materials. This certification applies to McGraw-Hill Global Education, LLC and McGraw-Hill School Education, LLC and their U.S. subsidiaries, collectively referred to here as McGraw-Hill Education. McGraw-Hill Education receives the personal information of natural persons located in the EU. McGraw-Hill Education uses this personal information: 1) to market, sell, provide, maintain and improve McGraw-Hill Education commercial web sites and digital learning solutions for EU citizens and commercial organizations, 2) to perform education and/or product related research, 3) to accomplish human resources related activities and 4) to monitor McGraw-Hill Education facilities and technology for security purposes. The above includes personal information the McGraw-Hill Education collects and processes as a data controller, as well as personal information McGraw-Hill Education collects and processes as a data processor, as those terms are defined in EU law.
